Text: Is there any way that you can get Real Sports that airs on HBO?

Hey TvTeam, what ever happened to the 360p. format you used to upload ? I never had a problem watching those games,but because my computer has small disk space,the higher res. formats, ( 480p. & 720p. ),aren't watchable. I can't afford to plop down money on an external memory just to watch sports.  Bud :)
